FileFormat.FormatDescription: Picture Publisher Bitmap files are the native raster graphics format of Picture Publisher, a Micrografx graphics application. The software was originally purchased from Astral in 1991 and later purchased by Corel in 2001. It was superseded by Corel Photo-Paint.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
